name: UIFocusHeading
desc: The general type of an event.

items.name: static var up: UIFocusHeading
items.desc: The focus update is heading in the up direction.

items.name: static var down: UIFocusHeading
items.desc: The focus update is heading in the down direction.

items.name: static var left: UIFocusHeading
items.desc: The focus update is heading in the left direction.

items.name: static var right: UIFocusHeading
items.desc: The focus update is heading in the right direction.

items.name: static var next: UIFocusHeading
items.desc: The focus update is heading to the next item.

items.name: static var previous: UIFocusHeading
items.desc: The focus update is heading to the previous item.
